```{r}
library('DESeq2')
set.seed(123)
data_mat <- matrix(sample(1:100, replace=TRUE), nrow=5, ncol=10)
colnames(data_mat) <- c('cond1', 'cond2', 'cond3', 'cond4', 'cond5', 'ctrl1', 
                        'ctrl2', 'ctrl3', 'ctrl4', 'ctrl5')
rownames(data_mat) <- c('gene1', 'gene2', 'gene3', 'gene4', 'gene5')

coldata <- data.frame(
  condition = factor(ifelse(grepl("^cond", colnames(data_mat)), "cond", "ctrl"))
)
rownames(coldata) <- colnames(data_mat)

deseq_mat <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(
  countData = data_mat,
  colData   = coldata,
  design    = ~ condition
)
deseq_results <- DESeq(deseq_mat)
log2foldchange <- results(deseq_results)["log2FoldChange"]

log2foldchange
```
